actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to remove certain lands from the Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, Oklahoma.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the Wichita Mountains Association specified lands in the Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge in Oklahoma. Conditions such conveyance upon the use of the lands for public recreational and cultural activities. Requires that title revert to the United States in the event the lands are no longer used for such purposes.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain lands from the Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, Oklahoma.
